sections.title: Children's Engineering Workshops

sections.instructions: Questions 11–14: Choose the correct letter A, B or C. Questions 15–20: Write the correct letter A–J.

questions.question: Stevenson's was founded in

sections.title: Art projects

questions.question: Which TWO parts of the introductory stage to their art projects do Jess and Tom agree were useful?
options: C the Natural History Museum visit
D the projects done in previous years
E the handouts with research sources

questions.question: In which TWO ways do both Jess and Tom decide to change their proposals?
options: A by giving a rationale for their action plans
B by being less specific about the outcome
C by adding a video diary presentation
D by providing a timeline and a mind map
E by making their notes more evaluative

sections.title: Stoicism

questions.question: Stoicism is still relevant today because of its ____ appeal.

the ____ people make in response can be controlled.
experiences which others would consider as ____.
